  1. haveno
  2. haveno_service.dart
haveno_services

haveno_service library

Classes

AccountService
The AccountService class provides various functionalities for managing a user's account on the Haveno platform. It includes methods to check if an account exists, create an account, change the password, and handle potential gRPC errors.
DisputeAgentService
The DisputeAgentService class provides functionalities to manage dispute agents within the Haveno platform. It allows for the registration and unregistration of dispute agents through gRPC calls.
DisputeService
GetVersionService
A service that handles the retrieval of the Haveno daemon version via gRPC.
HelpService
NotificationsService
A service class to manage notifications from the Haveno daemon.
OfferService
Client class to handle offer-related operations with the Haveno Daemon.
PaymentAccountService
A service that provides methods to interact with payment accounts and payment methods using the Haveno gRPC client.
PriceService
A service that handles the retrieval of market price information for XMR (Monero) using the Haveno gRPC API.
TradesService
A service that handles trade-related operations via the Haveno gRPC API.
TradeStatisticsService
A service that handles the retrieval of trade statistics from the Haveno gRPC API.
WalletsService
A service that handles wallet-related operations via the Haveno gRPC API.
XmrConnectionsService
A service that manages XMR (Monero) node connections via the Haveno gRPC API.
XmrNodeService
A provider for XMR (Monero) node settings via the Haveno gRPC API.
